title: Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber prove their endless love as they step out for a date night
text:
It's date night for these two love birds.

Cindy Crawford, 53, and Rande Gerber, 57, stepped out for dinner at The Mercer in New York on Wednesday evening while sporting matching denim looks for their romantic night out.

The happy couple both wore jeans and black jackets while dining at the new american restaurant before looping arms and heading back home.

Date night: Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber stepped out for dinner at The Mercer in New York on Wednesday evening while sporting matching denim looks for their date night out

The cover girl wore a black leather jacket over-top a black blouse that had a high neckline and small white polka dots.

She paired the evening look with a pair of light wash jeans and black boots.

Her dark brown hair looked freshly blown out as she stunned for the simple night on the town.

Details: The cover girl wore a black leather jacket over-top a black blouse that had a high neckline and small white polka dots

Her businessman husband kept it cool and casual in a black bomber jacket and forest green button up.

Rande paired the dashing look with a pair of dark wash jeans and black shoes.

He kept is gaze ahead as he lead his wife of 21 years out of the restaurant.

Dashing: Her businessman husband kept it cool and casual in a black bomber jacket and forest green button up

The two tied the knot back in May of 1998 and share their two children together, Presley, 20, and Kaia, 18, who both have chosen to follow their famous mother's career path and get into modeling.

In 2017, she opened up to People about making their marriage work for so long saying it was all about 'compromise.'

'I've learned when to give in, and I think he's learned to give in,' Crawford revealed. 'We push each other, so I think we would both agree that our combined projects are more layered and interesting because they have to make room for both of our aesthetics.'
